message: Let's be fair, Bob. I take a bit more since I'm losing money over time.
I'll take a larger share this time, but I'm still willing to split it fairly.  Inflation hurts us both, but I think this is a good deal for both of us.
Bob, my friend, we're running out of time. I need to secure a decent amount before inflation eats away at it.  This is my final offer.
